alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 7:30PM EDT until April 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD...WEST CENTRAL CHARLES CITY AND NORTHWESTERN PRINCE GEORGE COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF HOPEWELL... At 730 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jordans Point to near Hopewell to Prince George, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Garysville around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Barnetts, Jordan Point Country Club, Wayside and Birchett Estate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; Prince George
